title: Practical Project-Based Curriculum Applying Economic Development Theories

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational macroeconomics, statistical analysis methods, and understanding of economic policies
context.additional_context: Analysis of real-world applications of economic development theories using the work experiences of current practitioners, along with project development.

learning_goals: Students can design actionable business models to address regional economic challenges based on economic development theories.
Learners can analyze economic indicator data to write reports predicting policy impacts.
Participants can explain methods for assessing the social impact of economic development strategies through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
